title: Salmon and coleslaw filling for sandwiches

ingredients.content: 250 g Chinese cabbage, cut into pieces
300 g smoked salmon, cut into strips

preparations.content: Place a jug onto the mixing bowl lid, weigh oil into jug and set aside.

Place egg, salt, pepper, mustard, ketchup, lemon juice and chilli powder into mixing bowl. Mix <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 4<b> while very slowly pouring reserved oil onto mixing bowl lid, letting it drizzle around measuring cup in a thin stream onto rotating blades. Transfer mayonaise to a bowl and set aside. Rinse mixing bowl.
Place coriander and cabbage into mixing bowl and chop <b>2 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a large bowl and set aside.

Place carrots and radish in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to bowl with cabbage, mix with 180 g mayonnaise and salmon. Fill baguettes with salmon filling and sprinkle with hazelnuts (optional). Cut baguette into pieces and serve fresh.

hintsAndTricks: Use left over mayonnaise for salads or dips.
